thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Cleared Contact Lens To Incorporate Additive That Automatically Darkens Lens When Exposed To Bright Light

title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Cleared Contact Lens To Incorporate Additive That Automatically Darkens Lens When Exposed To Bright Light
text:
Market News April 10, 2018 / 5:53 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Cleared Contact Lens To Incorporate Additive That Automatically Darkens Lens When Exposed To Bright Light Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - U.S. Food & Drug Administration: 
* U.S. FOOD & DRUG ADMINISTRATION SAYS CLEARED FIRST CONTACT LENS TO INCORPORATE ADDITIVE THAT AUTOMATICALLY DARKENS LENS WHEN EXPOSED TO BRIGHT LIGHT 
* U.S. FDA SAYS GRANTED CLEARANCE OF THE ACUVUE OASYS CONTACT LENSES WITH TRANSITIONS LIGHT INTELLIGENT TECHNOLOGY TO JOHNSON & JOHNSON VISION CARE INC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
